address_list.description: Unique identifier for the Metro Availability Witness Site. Ipv6 compatible.

ip_addresses.description: Unique identifier for the Metro Availability Witness Site.

marked_for_removal.description: flag indicating whether the witness site is deleted or not

password.description: password used to communicate with Metro Availability Witness Site

username.description: username used to communicate with Metro Availability Witness Site

uuid.description: Unique identifier of the Metro Availability Witness Site

all_hyperv_nodes_in_failover_cluster.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates whether all the Hyper-V nodes in the NOS cluster (that are not marked for removal)are a part of a Hyper-V failover cluster

cluster_functions.description: This field describes the type of cluster

cluster_uuid.description: Uuid of the cluster this entity belongs to

credential.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this propertyindicates the credential for the account that has permissions to modify the domain account representing the NOS cluster

domain.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates the AD domain name that this cluster is a part of

enable_efficient_metric_sync.description: Indicates if the metric syncing from PE to PC should be downsampled

enforce_rackable_unit_aware_placement.description: Indicates whether RackableUnit (RU) aware placement has been enforced.

gpu_driver_version.description: Host driver version of the GPU

nos_cluster_and_hosts_domain_joined.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates whether the NOS cluster and the constituent hosts are all joined to the same domain

ssd_pinning_percentage_limit.description: This field describes the allowable percentage pinning on the ssd

storage_type.description: This field describes the storage type of cluster

external_client_enabled.description: Indicates whether external iscsi initiators are enabled or not

enabled.description: Whether data in transit encryption is enabled.
enabled.notes: Set to true/false to enable/disable data in transit encryption.

last_disabled_timestamp_secs.description: Unix epoch timestamp when data in transit encryption was last disabled.
last_disabled_timestamp_secs.notes: Timestamp when data in transit encryption was last disabled.

last_enabled_timestamp_secs.description: Unix epoch timestamp when data in transit encryption was last enabled.
last_enabled_timestamp_secs.notes: Timestamp when data in transit encryption was enabled.

cluster_non_fault_tolerant_entries.description: Cluster level non fault tolerant entries.

cluster_under_replicated_data_bytes.description: Cluster level under replicated data bytes.

component_fault_tolerance_status.description: List of component and their status.

domain_type.description: Type of the domain for which we are recording the fault tolerance status.

address_value.description: Address of the proxy either IPv4 or IPv6

port.description: Port on which proxy is binding
port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

proxy_types.description: Proxy types to send applicable traffic
proxy_types.notes: Proxy types to send applicable traffic. Supports 'http' 'https', and 'socks' proxy configuration.

delete_intent_set.description: Setting this to True will start a background process to delete all files from recycle bin. Deletion is still in progress if this is set to True in a GET call.
delete_intent_set.notes: Indicates an intent to delete all files from recycle bin

recycle_bin_disabled_reason.description: If present, this indicates the reason why recycle bin is disabled temporarily by the system.
recycle_bin_disabled_reason.notes: Reason why recycle bin is disabled by the system

recycle_bin_disabled_timestamp_secs.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds when recycle bin was disabled by the system.
recycle_bin_disabled_timestamp_secs.notes: Timestamp when recycle bin was disabled

recycle_bin_ttlsecs.description: Time to live in seconds of a file in recycle bin. Setting this to 0 will disable recycle bin.
recycle_bin_ttlsecs.notes: Time to live in seconds of a file in recycle bin

port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

server_address.description: Address of SMTP server, either IPv4 or IPv6
